body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Freedom Of Information Act              Freedom Of Information Act       All requests for information about Guadalupe Mountains National Park made through the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) must be submitted to the park's Public Affairs Officer. Please direct all correspondence to:  Public Affairs Officer ATTN: FOIA Guadalupe Mountains National Park 400 Pine Canyon Road Salt Flat, Texas 79847  For more information on how to file a FOIA request, please visit the Department of the Interior's Freedom of Information Act Program website at www.doi.gov/foia.
title: Guadalupe Mountains National Park: Freedom Of Information Act
